column5: This happened at Vancouver Intl Airport  Its a nice way to ease the stress of of being at an airport, although doubt this could happen at an American airport these days Air Canada must have arranged it.
I now understand why terrorists blow up airports      oh  I mean how sweet, Merry Christmas    LOL
Thumbs up to Air Canada, Only in Canada Richard
Man, That's...........................  The choir mob in the mall is waaaaaay cooler.
I thought it was pretty cool brought a smile to my face thanks for posting.
